paragraphs.body: If Avatar Wiki is not run and hosted by a single person, then it is logical to ask who is responsible for the front-end look and feel of the site. As Avatar Wiki is a wiki, a number of people collaborated to provide Avatar Wiki's current designs. The current theme (mainly a matter of choosing colors and CSS customization) was designed by The 888th Avatar, with a background and logo provided by Thailog. Thailog also designed two previous themes for the wiki. The logos for the fanon and movie sections of the site were created by Water Spout. The current home page was created by The 888th Avatar and Thailog.
